intro: Stenostomum pauciflorum, commonly known as the few-flowered stenostomum, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Rhamnaceae. It is a shrub characterized by its small, simple leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-green flowers. The plant produces small, spherical fruits that contain one or two seeds. It is native to parts of Africa and is often found in dry, rocky habitats. Due to its limited distribution and specific ecological requirements, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
